Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are trying to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a string telephone in their drawing, showing how it connects the two students.
The student can use labels to indicate that the string telephone uses sound to carry the message over the distance.
The student can draw the materials provided for building the string telephone, such as cups and string.
The student can show how the device allows communication between the students using sound through the string.
The student can illustrate how the string must be taut for sound to travel effectively.
The student can explain with labels or notes how this technology helps people communicate over distances.
